notes.text:
Don't overwork the meat when forming patties
Make a small indent in center to prevent puffing
Let burgers rest for 2 minutes before serving

steps.descr: Form beef into 4 patties, season generously

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by forming the beef into 4 lovely patties. Give them a good seasoning with salt and pepper. Remember, don't overwork the meat!

steps.instructions: Form beef into 4 patties, season generously

steps.descr: Caramelize onions in a pan over low heat

on_enter.say: Now, let's caramelize those onions. Pop them in a pan over low heat and let them slowly turn golden and sweet. You'll know they're ready when they smell amazing!

steps.instructions: Caramelize onions in a pan over low heat

steps.descr: Heat grill or pan to high, cook burgers 3-4 minutes per side

on_enter.say: Time to cook those burgers! Heat your grill or pan to high and cook each patty for about 3 to 4 minutes on each side. Listen for that lovely sizzle!

steps.instructions: Heat grill or pan to high, cook burgers 3-4 minutes per side

steps.descr: Add cheese in last minute, cover to melt

on_enter.say: In the last minute of cooking, let's add a slice of cheddar cheese on top of each patty. Cover them up to let the cheese melt beautifully.

steps.instructions: Add cheese in last minute, cover to melt

on_enter.say: Let's give those burger buns a quick toast. Just a minute or two until they're nice and warm with a bit of crunch.

steps.descr: Mix mayo, ketchup, and mustard for special sauce

on_enter.say: Let's whip up our special sauce by mixing mayonnaise, ketchup, and mustard. This will add a lovely tang to our burgers!

steps.instructions: Mix mayo, ketchup, and mustard for special sauce

steps.descr: Assemble burgers with all toppings and serve

on_enter.say: Now for the best part - let's assemble our burgers! Layer on the patties, caramelized onions, lettuce, tomato, pickles, and that special sauce. Serve them up and enjoy!

steps.instructions: Assemble burgers with all toppings and serve

recipe.title: Gourmet Beef Burger
recipe.description: Juicy homemade burger with caramelized onions and special sauce
